courses.title: Web Development Basics
courses.description: Learn the fundamental concepts of web development including HTML, CSS, and basic JavaScript.

courses.title: Responsive Web Design
courses.description: Master the art of creating responsive and mobile-friendly websites with CSS frameworks like Bootstrap.

courses.title: JavaScript Fundamentals
courses.description: Build a strong foundation in JavaScript programming with hands-on projects and exercises.

courses.title: Full-Stack Web Development
courses.description: Become a full-stack developer by mastering both front-end and back-end technologies like React and Node.js

courses.title: Python for Web Development
courses.description: Learn how to use Python to build dynamic and interactive web applications.

courses.title: Front-End Development Bootcamp
courses.description: Intensive bootcamp to master front-end technologies like HTML, CSS, JavaScript, and popular frameworks.

courses.title: Back-End Development Essentials
courses.description: Learn essential back-end development skills including databases, server-side programming, and APIs.

courses.title: UI/UX Design Principles
courses.description: Understand the principles of user interface and user experience design for creating web applications.

courses.title: Advanced Web Technologies
courses.description: Explore advanced web development topics like WebAssembly and Progressive Web Apps (PWAs)

courses.title: Web Security and Ethical Hacking
courses.description: Learn about web security vulnerabilities and ethical hacking techniques to secure web applications.
